ComicInfo.Title: The Fisherman of Space; The Last Man; A Will from the Grave; The Cycle of Time!; The Mystery of Easter Island; Murderer's Mask; Headed for the Stars; The Drummer of Tedworth
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 11:25:33. [CVDB391286] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 21:37:55. [Issue ID 262378]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Toth,Henry Sharp,Everett Raymond Kinstler,Murphy Anderson,Gene Colan,Alex Toth,Henry Sharp,Everett Raymond Kinstler,Murphy Anderson,Gene Colan
ComicInfo.Inker: Mike Peppe,Henry Sharp,Everett Raymond Kinstler,Murphy Anderson,Gene Colan,Mike Peppe,Henry Sharp,Everett Raymond Kinstler,Murphy Anderson,Gene Colan
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Fisherman of Space: The Fisherman From Space picks up people over time and leaves them on an island where they never grow old.
The Last Man: Dan Vickerson returns from an undersea voyage to find everyone in the world killed by gas.
A Will from the Grave: A farmer dies but reveals where his will is in a dream.
The Cycle of Time!: A small-time crook steals a time-machine but accidentally kills an alternate-time version of himself.
The Mystery of Easter Island: Facts about the history of Easter Island.
Murderer's Mask: Donald Blanshard buys a mask to scare his rich uncle to death, but gets more than he bargained for when his face transforms to that of the mask.
Headed for the Stars: A short history of flight.
The Drummer of Tedworth: A man has his drum taken away from him as punishment for vagrancy, but the judge who did it is haunted by the drum.
